items.title: 中 (zhōng)
items.content:
Meaning: middle, center, China

Pinyin: zhōng

Stroke count: 4

This character means middle or center. The vertical stroke through the center represents something being in the middle.

items.title: 学 (xué)
items.content:
Meaning: study, learn, school

Pinyin: xué

Stroke count: 8

This character means to study or learn. It is commonly used in words related to education.

items.title: 生 (shēng)
items.content:
Meaning: life, birth, grow

Pinyin: shēng

Stroke count: 5

This character represents life or birth. It shows a plant sprouting from the ground.
